resources.string: Help us improve HELIOS Messenger by sending your crash logs to the development team. Please find detailed information about crash reports in our FAQ.
Crash information available. We kindly ask you to send this information to HELIOS Messenger developers and help us improving our service.
Error information available. We kindly ask you to send this information to HELIOS Messenger developers and help us improving our service.
I am using HELIOS Messenger and would like to add you as contact. Download the app now and accept my friends request:\n%1$s%2$s\n%3$s
I am using HELIOS Messenger and would like to add you as contact. Download the app now and accept my friends request:\n%1$s%2$s\n%3$s

HELIOS Messenger 
- your secure multimedia messenger

Security, data protection and the protection of privacy are of extreme importance to us. HELIOS Messenger sets new standards in mobile data transmission and puts mobile privacy to a whole new level, due to latest encryption and transmission technologies. HELIOS Messenger provides an easy and unlimited exchange of data between smartphones and tablets, without constraining users to register and enter confidential data.

Share hugs & kisses
Please re-start HELIOS Messenger to complete restoring your account.
Please copy a backup to\n%1$s\nto restore a former HELIOS Messenger account.
Create groups to chat with many friends at once.
